data.datasets.util.get_cv_rotation¶

data.datasets.util.get_cv_rotation(dirlist, rotation=0, k=5, train_fraction=1)¶

Return train, val, test dataframes for a cross-validation rotation

Parameters

  • dirlist – list of directories containing the data

  • rotation – rotation of cross validation

  • k – number of folds for cross_validation

  • train_fraction – fraction of training data to use

Returns

returns three data generators train, val, test

data.datasets.util.df_to_image_dataset

Next topic

data.datasets.util.get_file_name_tuples
